attributes.action: Ignore requests to require pre 1973 vehicles to pay road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst true that the exhaust emissions of pre 1973 vehicles are higher mile for mile than modern vehicles, firstly they tend to be used for very low annual mileages and secondly the energy and raw materials which would be required to build modern replacements would result in any reduction in the numbers of older vehicles being counter productive from the environmental perspective.
